entry.title: WIND WARNING IN EFFECT, Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 09:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -18.4°C
Wind: W 53 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Blowing snow this morning. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
